verses.verse: וּֽלְנָעֳמִ֞י <S%H5281><s%> And Naomi [מְיֻדָּע כ] (מֹודַ֣ע <S%H3045><s%> acknowledge ק) לְאִישָׁ֗הּ <S%H376><s%> of her husband's אִ֚ישׁ <S%H376><s%> man גִּבּ֣וֹר <S%H1368><s%> a mighty חַ֔יִל <S%H2428><s%> of wealth מִמִּשְׁפַּ֖חַת <S%H4940><s%> of the family אֱלִימֶ֑לֶךְ <S%H458><s%> of Elimelech וּשְׁמ֖וֹ <S%H8034><s%> and his name בֹּֽעַז׃ <S%H1162><s%> [was] Boaz

וַתֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said ר֨וּת <S%H7327><s%> And Ruth הַמּוֹאֲבִיָּ֜ה <S%H4125><s%> the Moabitess אֶֽל־ <S%H413><s%> to נָעֳמִ֗י <S%H5281><s%> unto Naomi אֵֽלְכָה־ <S%H1980><s%> go נָּ֤א <S%H4994><s%> Please הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> to the field וַאֲלַקֳטָ֣ה <S%H3950><s%> and glean בַשִּׁבֳּלִ֔ים <S%H7641><s%> ears of corn אַחַ֕ר <S%H310><s%> after אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> whose אֶמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> I shall find חֵ֖ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינָ֑יו <S%H5869><s%> [him] in whose sight וַתֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said לָ֖הּ לְכִ֥י <S%H1980><s%> to her Go בִתִּֽי׃ <S%H1323><s%> my daughter

וַתֵּ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> departed וַתָּבוֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> and came וַתְּלַקֵּ֣ט <S%H3950><s%> and gleaned בַּשָּׂדֶ֔ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after הַקֹּצְרִ֑ים <S%H7114><s%> the reapers וַיִּ֣קֶר <S%H7136><s%> was to light מִקְרֶ֔הָ <S%H4745><s%> and her hap חֶלְקַ֤ת <S%H2513><s%> on a part הַשָּׂדֶה֙ <S%H7704><s%> of the field לְבֹ֔עַז <S%H1162><s%> [belonging] unto Boaz אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who מִמִּשְׁפַּ֥חַת <S%H4940><s%> who [was] of the kindred אֱלִימֶֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H458><s%> of Elimelech

וְהִנֵּה־ <S%H2009><s%> now behold בֹ֗עַז <S%H1162><s%> And behold Boaz בָּ֚א <S%H935><s%> came מִבֵּ֣ית לֶ֔חֶם <S%H1035><s%> from Bethlehem וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לַקּוֹצְרִ֖ים <S%H7114><s%> unto the reapers יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD עִמָּכֶ֑ם <S%H5973><s%> and they וַיֹּ֥אמְרוּ <S%H559><s%> [be] with you And they answered ל֖וֹ יְבָרֶכְךָ֥ <S%H1288><s%> bless יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> him The LORD

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then said בֹּ֙עַז֙ <S%H1162><s%> Boaz לְנַעֲר֔וֹ <S%H5288><s%> unto his servant הַנִּצָּ֖ב <S%H5324><s%> that was set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הַקּֽוֹצְרִ֑ים <S%H7114><s%> over the reapers לְמִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> Whose הַנַּעֲרָ֥ה <S%H5291><s%> Whose damsel הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

וַיַּ֗עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered הַנַּ֛עַר <S%H5288><s%> And the servant הַנִּצָּ֥ב <S%H5324><s%> that was set עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> of הַקּוֹצְרִ֖ים <S%H7114><s%> over the reapers וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <S%H559><s%> and said נַעֲרָ֤ה <S%H5291><s%> damsel מֽוֹאֲבִיָּה֙ <S%H4125><s%> It [is] the Moabitish הִ֔יא <S%H1931><s%> who הַשָּׁ֥בָה <S%H7725><s%> that came back עִֽם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נָעֳמִ֖י <S%H5281><s%> with Naomi מִשְּׂדֵ֥ה <S%H7704><s%> out of the country מוֹאָֽב׃ <S%H4124><s%> of Moab

וַתֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> And she said אֲלַקֳטָה־ <S%H3950><s%> I pray you let me glean נָּא֙ <S%H4994><s%> Please וְאָסַפְתִּ֣י <S%H622><s%> and gather בָֽעֳמָרִ֔ים <S%H6016><s%> among the sheaves אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> after הַקּוֹצְרִ֑ים <S%H7114><s%> the reapers וַתָּב֣וֹא <S%H935><s%> so she came וַֽתַּעֲמ֗וֹד <S%H5975><s%> and hath continued מֵאָ֤ז <S%H227><s%> even הַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <S%H1242><s%> from the morning וְעַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until עַ֔תָּה <S%H6258><s%> now זֶ֛ה <S%H2088><s%> she שִׁבְתָּ֥הּ <S%H3427><s%> until now that she tarried הַבַּ֖יִת <S%H1004><s%> in the house מְעָֽט׃ <S%H4592><s%> a little

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> Then said בֹּ֨עַז <S%H1162><s%> Boaz אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to ר֜וּת <S%H7327><s%> unto Ruth הֲל֧וֹא <S%H3808><s%> carefully שָׁמַ֣עַתְּ <S%H8085><s%> Hearest בִּתִּ֗י <S%H1323><s%> my daughter אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תֵּלְכִי֙ <S%H1980><s%> go לִלְקֹט֙ <S%H3950><s%> not to glean בְּשָׂדֶ֣ה <S%H7704><s%> field אַחֵ֔ר <S%H312><s%> in another וְגַ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> furthermore לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> carefully תַעֲבוּרִ֖י <S%H5674><s%> neither go מִזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וְכֹ֥ה <S%H3541><s%> here תִדְבָּקִ֖ין <S%H1692><s%> from hence but abide עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נַעֲרֹתָֽי׃ <S%H5291><s%> here fast by my maidens

עֵינַ֜יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> [Let] thine eyes בַּשָּׂדֶ֤ה <S%H7704><s%> [be] on the field אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which יִקְצֹרוּן֙ <S%H7114><s%> that they do reap וְהָלַ֣כְתְּ <S%H1980><s%> and go אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ן <S%H310><s%> thou after הֲל֥וֹא <S%H3808><s%> Indeed צִוִּ֛יתִי <S%H6680><s%> them have I not charged אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַנְּעָרִ֖ים <S%H5288><s%> the young men לְבִלְתִּ֣י <S%H1115><s%> not נָגְעֵ֑ךְ <S%H5060><s%> that they shall not touch וְצָמִ֗ת <S%H6770><s%> thee? and when thou art athirst וְהָלַכְתְּ֙ <S%H1980><s%> go אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַכֵּלִ֔ים <S%H3627><s%> unto the vessels וְשָׁתִ֕ית <S%H8354><s%> and drink מֵאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> what יִשְׁאֲב֖וּן <S%H7579><s%> have drawn הַנְּעָרִֽים׃ <S%H5288><s%> of [that] which the young men

וַתִּפֹּל֙ <S%H5307><s%> Then she fell עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> on פָּנֶ֔יהָ <S%H6440><s%> on her face וַתִּשְׁתַּ֖חוּ <S%H7812><s%> and bowed אָ֑רְצָה <S%H776><s%> herself to the ground וַתֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> to him מַדּוּעַ֩ <S%H4069><s%> Why מָצָ֨אתִי <S%H4672><s%> unto him Why have I found חֵ֤ן <S%H2580><s%> grace בְּעֵינֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5869><s%> in thine eyes לְהַכִּירֵ֔נִי <S%H5234><s%> that thou shouldest take knowledge וְאָנֹכִ֖י <S%H595><s%> I נָכְרִיָּֽה׃ <S%H5237><s%> alien

וַיַּ֤עַן <S%H6030><s%> answered בֹּ֙עַז֙ <S%H1162><s%> And Boaz וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said לָ֔הּ הֻגֵּ֨ד <S%H5046><s%> unto her It hath fully הֻגַּ֜ד <S%H5046><s%> been shewed לִ֗י כֹּ֤ל <S%H3605><s%> to her All אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> you עָשִׂית֙ <S%H6213><s%> me all that thou hast done אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for חֲמוֹתֵ֔ךְ <S%H2545><s%> unto thy mother in law אַחֲרֵ֖י <S%H310><s%> since מ֣וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death אִישֵׁ֑ךְ <S%H376><s%> of thine husband וַתַּֽעַזְבִ֞י <S%H5800><s%> and [how] thou hast left אָבִ֣יךְ <S%H1><s%> thy father וְאִמֵּ֗ךְ <S%H517><s%> and thy mother וְאֶ֙רֶץ֙ <S%H776><s%> and the land מֽוֹלַדְתֵּ֔ךְ <S%H4138><s%> of thy nativity וַתֵּ֣לְכִ֔י <S%H1980><s%> and came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַ֕ם <S%H5971><s%> unto a people אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יָדַ֖עַתְּ <S%H3045><s%> which thou knewest תְּמ֥וֹל <S%H8543><s%> before שִׁלְשֽׁוֹם׃ <S%H8032><s%> before that time

יְשַׁלֵּ֥ם <S%H7999><s%> recompense יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD פָּעֳלֵ֑ךְ <S%H6467><s%> thy work וּתְהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> become מַשְׂכֻּרְתֵּ֜ךְ <S%H4909><s%> reward שְׁלֵמָ֗ה <S%H8003><s%> and a full מֵעִ֤ם <S%H5973><s%> from יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> be given thee of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whose בָּ֖את <S%H935><s%> thou art come לַחֲס֥וֹת <S%H2620><s%> to trust תַּֽחַת־ <S%H8478><s%> under כְּנָפָֽיו׃ <S%H3671><s%> under whose wings

וַ֠תֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> Then she said אֶמְצָא־ <S%H4672><s%> Let me find חֵ֨ן <S%H2580><s%> favour בְּעֵינֶ֤יךָ <S%H5869><s%> in thy sight אֲדֹנִי֙ <S%H113><s%> my lord כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> and indeed נִֽחַמְתָּ֔נִי <S%H5162><s%> for that thou hast comforted וְכִ֥י <S%H3588><s%> and indeed דִבַּ֖רְתָּ <S%H1696><s%> me and for that thou hast spoken עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and לֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> friendly שִׁפְחָתֶ֑ךָ <S%H8198><s%> unto thine handmaid וְאָנֹכִי֙ <S%H595><s%> I לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> not אֶֽהְיֶ֔ה <S%H1961><s%> I am כְּאַחַ֖ת <S%H259><s%> though I be not like unto one שִׁפְחֹתֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H8198><s%> of thine handmaidens

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <S%H559><s%> said לָ֨ה בֹ֜עַז <S%H1162><s%> And Boaz לְעֵ֣ת <S%H6256><s%> after הָאֹ֗כֶל <S%H400><s%> eating גֹּ֤שִֽׁי <S%H5066><s%> come הֲלֹם֙ <S%H1988><s%> thou hither וְאָכַ֣לְתְּ <S%H398><s%> and eat מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַלֶּ֔חֶם <S%H3899><s%> of the bread וְטָבַ֥לְתְּ <S%H2881><s%> and dip פִּתֵּ֖ךְ <S%H6595><s%> thy morsel בַּחֹ֑מֶץ <S%H2558><s%> in the vinegar וַתֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <S%H3427><s%> And she sat מִצַּ֣ד <S%H6654><s%> beside הַקּֽוֹצְרִ֔ים <S%H7114><s%> the reapers וַיִּצְבָּט־ <S%H6642><s%> and he reached לָ֣הּ קָלִ֔י <S%H7039><s%> her parched וַתֹּ֥אכַל <S%H398><s%> [corn] and she did eat וַתִּשְׂבַּ֖ע <S%H7646><s%> and was sufficed וַתֹּתַֽר׃ <S%H3498><s%> and left

וַתָּ֖קָם <S%H6965><s%> And when she was risen up לְלַקֵּ֑ט <S%H3950><s%> to glean וַיְצַו֩ <S%H6680><s%> commanded בֹּ֨עַז <S%H1162><s%> Boaz אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נְעָרָ֜יו <S%H5288><s%> his young men לֵאמֹ֗ר <S%H559><s%> saying גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> even בֵּ֧ין <S%H996><s%> among הָֽעֳמָרִ֛ים <S%H6016><s%> even among the sheaves תְּלַקֵּ֖ט <S%H3950><s%> Let her glean וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תַכְלִימֽוּהָ׃ <S%H3637><s%> and reproach

וְגַ֛ם <S%H1571><s%> Also שֹׁל־ <S%H7997><s%> And let fall תָּשֹׁ֥לּוּ <S%H7997><s%> of purpose לָ֖הּ מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> from הַצְּבָתִ֑ים <S%H6653><s%> also [some] of the handfuls וַעֲזַבְתֶּ֥ם <S%H5800><s%> for her and leave וְלִקְּטָ֖ה <S%H3950><s%> [them] that she may glean וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not תִגְעֲרוּ־ <S%H1605><s%> [them] and rebuke בָֽהּ׃

וַתְּלַקֵּ֥ט <S%H3950><s%> So she gleaned בַּשָּׂדֶ֖ה <S%H7704><s%> in the field עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until הָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> until even וַתַּחְבֹּט֙ <S%H2251><s%> and beat out אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> what לִקֵּ֔טָה <S%H3950><s%> that she had gleaned וַיְהִ֖י <S%H1961><s%> become כְּאֵיפָ֥ה <S%H374><s%> and it was about an ephah שְׂעֹרִֽים׃ <S%H8184><s%> of barley
